name: Plugin Security Checker
author: juliobox

sections.description:
This plugin will warn you if you’re using or installing a knew as vulnerable extension or removed from official repository, a security must have plugin!

This uncludes a list of a maximum knew plugins to be vulnerable to any web security flaw, and also a list of more than 10.4k plugins removed from repo.

Just install it, it’s done, you’re warned in live!
sections.installation:
1. Extract the plugin folder from the downloaded ZIP file.
  2. Upload BAW WPSC folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin from the “Plugins” page in your Dashboard.
sections.faq:
1. What can i do if a plugin is vulnerable!?
    -> First you can read the exploit post, some solution can be provided, and most of the time : the desactivation or deletion is the only solution …
